law.text: The Legislative Research Commission shall keep a complete, accurate and adequate set of fiscal transactions and shall keep a complete file of copies of all audit reports, examinations, investigations, and other reports or releases issued by the Commission and a complete file of audit work papers and other evidence pertaining to the work of the Commission.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 11, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 13, effective July 1, 1966.

metadata.lrc-note: This is former KRS 6.410 as amended, renumbered by the Reviser of Statutes in 1974.
